titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of June 10, 2023, as "Veterans Get Outside Day".
Expressing support for the designation of June 10, 2023, as "Veterans Get Outside Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Veterans Get Outside Day and encourages the Department of Veterans Affairs, the Forest Service within the Department of Agriculture, and the Department of the Interior to coordinate to promote the day along with National Get Outdoors Day.
